com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.rails.logic

Class RailLogicHorizontal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.rails.logic.RailLogic
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.rails.logic.RailLogicHorizontal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RailLogicSloped

    public class RailLogicHorizontal
extends RailLogic
    Horizontal rail logic that does not operate on the vertical motion and position

      • getFixedPosition

        @Deprecated
public void getFixedPosition(org.bukkit.util.Vector position,
                                          com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.bases.IntVector3 railPos)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated: was used before the introduction of Rail Paths. This is here for backwards compatibility with plugins like TC Hangrail

        Gets the position of the Minecart when snapped to the rails. The input position vector is adjusted, with the result written into the same vector. This is only used once when creating the path for this rail logic.
        Parameters:
        position - input and result output
        railPos - of the rails using this logic
